name: ai-fitness-coach-app
description: AI Fitness Coach - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && npm install --prefix frontend && echo 'Building frontend...' && npm run build --prefix frontend && echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-deps: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend

author: AI Fitness Coach Team
